ARABIC: يَوْمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمْ فِى ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَٰلَيْتَنَآ أَطَعْنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعْنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will say on the Day their faces are rolled over in the Fire, 'If only we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day their faces would be turned on the fire (as on a spit), they will say: "Alas! If only we had obeyed God, and obeyed the Prophet."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On that Day when their faces shall be turned around in the Fire, they will say: “Would that we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when their faces will be turned from side to side on the fire, they will say, "Would that we had obeyed God and the Messenger!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On the day when their faces will be overturned being roasted inside the fire, they will say, “Alas – if only we had obeyed Allah and obeyed His Noble Messenger!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: On the Day when their faces will be turned over in the Fire, they will say: "Oh, would that we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: On the day when their faces shall be turned back into the fire, they shall say: O would that we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Apostle!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when their faces are turned about in the Fire they shall say, 'Ah, would we had obeyed God and the Messenger!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On the day when their faces are turned over in the Fire, they say: Oh, would that we had obeyed Allah and had obeyed His messenger!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On the Day when their faces are turned over in the Fire, they shall say: "Oh, would that we had obeyed God, and obeyed the Messenger!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On the Day whereon their faces shall be rolled in the Fire, they will say: Oh that we had obeyed Allah and had obeyed the apostle!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The day when their faces are turned about in the Fire, they will say, ‘We wish we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Apostle!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Day that their faces will be turned upside down in the Fire, they will say: "Woe to us! Would that we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: On the Day when their faces will be turned over in the Fire, they will say: "Oh, would that we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger (Muhammad SAW)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day when their faces are turned about in the Fire, they shall say: 'Would that we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Day when their faces are flipped into the Fire, they will say, “If only we had obeyed God and obeyed the Messenger.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire, they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:66] On the day when their faces are turned about in the Fire they shall say, ‘O (yā is for alerting) would that we had obeyed God and obeyed the Messenger!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On the day when their faces are turned over) are dragged (in the Fire, they say) both the leaders and the 481 followers: (Oh, would that we had obeyed Allah) by accepting faith (and had obeyed His messenger) by accepting their message!
